title: Transplanting a Tomato plant in a 4" pot to a gallon pot

tasks.task: Potting a tomato plant from a four-inch container to a gallon container
subtasks: Gather necessary tools and materials (potting soil, Mycorrhiza fungus, plant)
Remove tomato plant from original four-inch container
open up the roots gently
Position the plant in the new gallon container, ensuring it is planted as deep as possible
Remove leaves that would be below the soil line
Add Mycorrhiza fungus to the root zone
Fill the container with potting soil, maintaining proper air space
Tap the container to settle soil without compacting
Add appropriate drainage and ensure proper watering space
Secure plant with a stake if necessary
